00009 Alignment::Alignment(char* fileName)
00010 {
00011         this->fileName = fileName;
00012         igzstream file(fileName);
00013         if (!file.good())
00014         {
00015                 // exception openFileFail
00016                 throw 1;
00017         }
00018         else
00019         {
00020                 // read the first "SENT: x" from the alignment
00021                 this->file = &file;
00022                 string word;
00023                 file >> word; // SENT:
00024                 file >> sentenceNum;
00025         }
00026 }

00028 void Alignment::nextSentence(unsigned int srcLength, unsigned int targetLength)
00029 {
00030         initMatrix(srcLength, targetLength);
00031         unsigned int srcWordNum, destWordNum;
00032         string word;
00033         while (*file >> word)
00034         {
00035                 if (word == "SENT:")
00036                 {
00037                         sentenceNum++;
00038                         break;
00039                 }
00040                 else
00041                 {
00042                         *file >> srcWordNum;
00043                         *file >> destWordNum;
00044                         matrix[srcWordNum][destWordNum] = 1;
00045                 }
00046         }
00047 }
00048 
00049 void Alignment::initMatrix(unsigned int srcLength, unsigned int targetLength)
00050 {
00051         matrix.resize(srcLength);
00052         for (unsigned int i=0; i<matrix.size(); i++)
00053                 matrix[i].resize(targetLength, 0);
00054 }

00056 unsigned int Alignment::getMinTargetAlig(unsigned int j1, unsigned int j2)
00057 {
00058         unsigned int min=matrix[0].size()-1; // maximum length of a column
00059 
00060         // j = column
00061         for (unsigned int j=j1; j<=j2; j++)
00062         {
00063                 // i = entry in the j-column
00064                 unsigned int i=0;
00065                 while (i<matrix[j].size()-1 && matrix[j][i]==0)
00066                         i++;
00067                 if (matrix[j][i]==1 && i<min)
00068                 {
00069                         min = i;
00070                 }
00071         }
00072         return min;
00073 }
00074 
00075 unsigned int Alignment::getMaxTargetAlig(unsigned int j1, unsigned int j2)
00076 {
00077         unsigned int max=0; // minimum of a column
00078 
00079         // j = column
00080         for (unsigned int j=j1; j<=j2; j++)
00081         {
00082                 // i = entry in the j-column
00083                 unsigned int i=matrix[i].size()-1; // maximum length of a column
00084                 while (i>0 && matrix[j][i]==0)
00085                         i--;
00086                 if (matrix[j][i]==1 && i>max)
00087                 {
00088                         max = i;
00089                 }
00090         }
00091         return max;
00092 }
